Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
dbustl::ConnectionProvides an abstraction of a D-Bus Connection
dbustl::DBusExceptionThis class is used by DBusTL to report all of it internal errors
dbustl::EventLoopIntegrationAbstract base class for integration of DBusTL into native toolkits such as Glib or Qt
dbustl::GlibEventLoopIntegrationClass used for integration of DBusTL with Glib toolkit
dbustl::MessageMessage is a lightweight wrapper class around D-Bus C API DBusMessage struct
dbustl::ObjectProxyDefines a proxy, used to call methods an receive signals on a remote D-Bus object
dbustl::ObjectProxy::InterfaceThis class is used in call() member of ObjectProxy class to use an alternative Interface name for that particular method call only
